alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Jemez Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 2:22AM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches below 7,500 feet with higher amounts of 8 to 16 inches above 7500 feet possible. * WHERE...Jemez Mountains, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, and Harding County. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Harding County; Jemez Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
